title: bedroid
author: bedroid
content: Hello BitcoinTalk!I am considering selling one of my prized domain names: Bitcoin.casinoPlease send me a PM if you're interested. I don't have a BIN price set yet as I am welcoming and considering offers at this time.Best Regards,

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: This domain will command a price it's an aged domain and could be worth a lot QuoteDomain:bitcoin.casinoRegistrar:Go Canada Domains, LLCRegistered On:2015-05-28Expires On:2024-05-28Updated On:2021-08-27Status:clientDeleteProhibitedclientRenewProhibitedclientTransferProhibitedclientUpdateProhibitedName Servers:ns1.giow1075.siteground.usns2.giow1075.siteground.usVerify the ownership of the domain in a way that is possible and convenient for you for a buyer who wants to see if you really own the domain you can do that by creating an email forwarder to something like bedroid@bitcoin.casino personal message through this forum or even telegram is not acceptable

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on June 30, 2022, 04:04:46 AMThis domain will command a price it's an aged domain and could be worth a lot QuoteDomain:bitcoin.casinoRegistrar:Go Canada Domains, LLCRegistered On:2015-05-28Expires On:2024-05-28Updated On:2021-08-27Status:clientDeleteProhibitedclientRenewProhibitedclientTransferProhibitedclientUpdateProhibitedName Servers:ns1.giow1075.siteground.usns2.giow1075.siteground.usVerify the ownership of the domain in a way that is possible and convenient for you for a buyer who wants to see if you really own the domain you can do that by creating an email forwarder to something like bedroid@bitcoin.casino personal message through this forum or even telegram is not acceptableI think the buyer itself will ask this personally if there will be anyone interested to purchase it because even if he sent email using that email address. The only thing he can provide is screenshot which might be fake and edited. I believe the buyer itself will not send the funds without escrow and checking the ownership of the domain.OP, you should try selling it on Bitcasino because the domain name has a resemblance to them and they might interested to use it as a proxy website.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: bedroid on June 30, 2022, 03:51:15 AMHello BitcoinTalk!I am considering selling one of my prized domain names: Bitcoin.casinoPlease send me a PM if you're interested. I don't have a BIN price set yet as I am welcoming and considering offers at this time.Best Regards,since you haven't decided on the price yet, I tried appraising it on "godaddy domain appraisals" and the estimated value is $5.4k. also, it seems that the domain has been sold before too(at least according to this). are you the one who bought it before?anyway, perhaps try posting this and auctioning it on the Auction board if you are uncertain about what your BIN price is.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: This is their contact page, if someone decides to make an offer then please verify first to one of their emails: support@bitcoin.casino or media@bitcoin.casino to make sure if the domain is actually for sale or being auctioned.For @op, I suggest linking this thread on your main page (or anywhere else on that site).

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: acroman08 on June 30, 2022, 04:44:38 AMQuote from: bedroid on June 30, 2022, 03:51:15 AMHello BitcoinTalk!I am considering selling one of my prized domain names: Bitcoin.casinoPlease send me a PM if you're interested. I don't have a BIN price set yet as I am welcoming and considering offers at this time.Best Regards,since you haven't decided on the price yet, I tried appraising it on "godaddy domain appraisals" and the estimated value is $5.4k. also, it seems that the domain has been sold before too(at least according to this). are you the one who bought it before?anyway, perhaps try posting this and auctioning it on the Auction board if you are uncertain about what your BIN price is.I consider this as a top-level domain, and will easily have an impact on the casino industry because on the domain alone you can easily tell what the domain is for, it could be more than $5.4k why not include the website and all its content the value will be 20% higher than the appraisal tool, I hope Bitcointalk can help you find the right buyer the industry is still welcoming new players so i'm sure you will find a group or company that will be interested to buy your domain.

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: As many of the forum members mentioned above that there is an official contact page on the website itself, I will link it here again:Â  https://bitcoin.casino/contact/Anyone willing to buy this domain should contact them directly instead of DMing or making any offers here, there is no proof attached in the post to support that OP is the real owner of this domain.It could be worth a lot, depending on the right person. For me, I wouldn't even pay $500 as it's of no use to me.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: Quote from: acroman08 on June 30, 2022, 04:44:38 AMQuote from: bedroid on June 30, 2022, 03:51:15 AMHello BitcoinTalk!I am considering selling one of my prized domain names: Bitcoin.casinoPlease send me a PM if you're interested. I don't have a BIN price set yet as I am welcoming and considering offers at this time.Best Regards,since you haven't decided on the price yet, I tried appraising it on "godaddy domain appraisals" and the estimated value is $5.4k. also, it seems that the domain has been sold before too(at least according to this). are you the one who bought it before?anyway, perhaps try posting this and auctioning it on the Auction board if you are uncertain about what your BIN price is.I guess this domain is an old domain name or have popularity before because if this a one or two year domain old, the price will not too high as you mention. Someone who want to buy this domain must spend so much money and I guess it is not worth it for people who want to start a new casino as they can register a new domain which is cheaper than the old domain name.Maybe @OP needs to give another thing to attract potential buyer to buy his domain because if that is just a domain, people will think twice to buy it. But if the potential buyer really have a lot of money, that will not be a problem.
